title: What a Vuelta! Hollering for Vollering, Reenergized Reusser and a Rejuvenated Van der Breggen
content:
Seven takeaways from La Vuelta Femenina as a goat chomps up more wins, a great inches closer to her best form and two stars run out of oomph.

Read the full article at What a Vuelta! Hollering for Vollering, Reenergized Reusser and a Rejuvenated Van der Breggen on Velo.
author: sstokes
